channel.title: GiNZA on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GiNZA on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] A story about trying magic tricks of live coding of natural language processing and dependency analysis with LT in an instant from an empty place
item.description: # wrap up GiNZA, which carries out ultra-high-precision natural language processing and dependency analysis, is amazing, With Colaboratory, you don’t need to build an environment and you can use it easily with just a browser. During the LT (Lightning Talk) in order to emphasize that crispness On-the-fly environment construction & natural code processing by writing code, Moreover, I tried the “magic trick” that says I can achieve high precision and high functionality.

item.title: [Python] [For beginners] Language analysis using natural language processing tool GiNZA (from morphological analysis to vectorization)
item.description: #Introduction Recently, I started using the Python language processing tool “GiNZA”. I used to use MeCab so far, but I recently (shyly) found out that Python has a library that incorporates state-of-the-art machine learning techniques, so I’m currently moving to GiNZA. This time it is the first GiNZA, so I tried to summarize the processing flow as a memorandum while referring to various sites. There are many places that I am new to natural language analysis and I can not reach it, so please refer to the official documents etc.
